(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Bludgeoning Damage [blunt])

Requires 10N5D to forge (N2D1)

The goatlike skull of a Pan is inscribed with a rune of horror and placed on top of a foul standard. The skull causes fear to grow in the hearts of enemies.
